price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߢߐ߲߰ߘߐ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߜߍ߬ߘߍ߲߬ߣߊ߲߬ߞߏ ߛߎ߬ߘߎ߲߬ߧߊ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߣߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: قُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul ʿasā an yakūna radifa lakum baʿḍu alladhī tastaʿjilūna
